info.name: Stream
info.description:
Adds a stream option to the right click menu on audio and video files
Inspired from how "Stream" works on the Nextcloud Android App, by creating a 24h link and in this case I also pack it in a playlist and "open" it. The reason for packing it in a playlist is to get the same behaviour as the app, to call a media player and play it back instead of trying to download it. The link created also allows for searching in the media.
info.author: Oste Hovel
